channel.title: API endpoint is returning login page
channel.description:
Hi, I'm trying to access my redash account via API but no matter what I do it keeps me returning this HTML page for login and I cannot get CSV nor JSON. I tried it in `authorization` header, api_key parameter from make.com, from postman, account's API key, "Show API Key" query by quey but still cannot achive this.
Does anyone have any insights for this?

item.title: API endpoint is returning login page
item.dc:creator: KMer
item.description:
Hi,
I’m trying to access my redash account via API but no matter what I do it keeps me returning this HTML page for login and I cannot get CSV nor JSON.
I tried it in authorization header, api_key parameter from make.com, from postman, account’s API key, “Show API Key” query by quey but still cannot achive this.

Does anyone have any insights for this?
